test_dephasing
==============

.. py:module:: test_dephasing

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Comprehensive test suite for dephasing.py module.

   Tests all dephasing calculation functions including initialization, dephasing rates,
   off-diagonal dephasing matrices, and file I/O operations.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   test_dephasing.hbar
   test_dephasing.pi
   test_dephasing.ii


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   test_dephasing.TestInitializeDephasing
   test_dephasing.TestVxx2
   test_dephasing.TestCalcGammaE
   test_dephasing.TestCalcGammaH
   test_dephasing.TestCalcOffDiagDeph_E
   test_dephasing.TestCalcOffDiagDeph_H
   test_dephasing.TestCalcOffDiagDeph_E2
   test_dephasing.TestCalcOffDiagDeph_H2
   test_dephasing.TestOffDiagDephasing
   test_dephasing.TestOffDiagDephasing2
   test_dephasing.TestPrintGam
   test_dephasing.TestWriteDephasing
   test_dephasing.TestIntegration


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: hbar

.. py:data:: pi

.. py:data:: ii
   :value: 1j


.. py:class:: TestInitializeDephasing

   Test dephasing module initialization.


   .. py:method:: setup_method()

      Set up test fixtures.



   .. py:method:: teardown_method()

      Clean up after tests.



   .. py:method:: test_initialize_dephasing_small()

      Test InitializeDephasing with small array.



   .. py:method:: test_initialize_dephasing_even_length()

      Test InitializeDephasing with even length array.



   .. py:method:: test_initialize_dephasing_odd_length()

      Test InitializeDephasing with odd length array.



   .. py:method:: test_initialize_dephasing_prime_length()

      Test InitializeDephasing with prime length array.



   .. py:method:: test_initialize_dephasing_single_element()

      Test InitializeDephasing with single element array.



   .. py:method:: test_initialize_dephasing_index_bounds()

      Test that initialized indices are within valid bounds.



   .. py:method:: test_initialize_dephasing_xe_xh_positive()

      Test that xe and xh arrays are positive.



.. py:class:: TestVxx2

   Test squared interaction matrix calculation.


   .. py:method:: setup_method()

      Set up test fixtures.



   .. py:method:: test_vxx2_small()

      Test Vxx2 with small array.



   .. py:method:: test_vxx2_even_length()

      Test Vxx2 with even length array.



   .. py:method:: test_vxx2_odd_length()

      Test Vxx2 with odd length array.



   .. py:method:: test_vxx2_single_element()

      Test Vxx2 with single element array.



   .. py:method:: test_vxx2_zero_momentum()

      Test Vxx2 with zero momentum.



.. py:class:: TestCalcGammaE

   Test electron dephasing rate calculation.

      Set up test fixtures.



   .. py:method:: teardown_method()

      Clean up after tests.

      Test CalcGammaE with basic inputs.



   .. py:method:: test_calc_gamma_e_zero_populations()

      Test CalcGammaE with zero populations.



   .. py:method:: test_calc_gamma_e_error_if_not_initialized()

      Test that CalcGammaE raises error if not initialized.



   .. py:method:: test_calc_gamma_e_different_sizes()

      Test CalcGammaE with different array sizes.

   Test dephasing rate file writing function.


   .. py:method:: setup_method()

      Set up test fixtures.



   .. py:method:: test_write_dephasing_basic()

      Test WriteDephasing with basic inputs.



   .. py:method:: test_write_dephasing_different_indices()

      Test WriteDephasing with different wire and time indices.



.. py:class:: TestIntegration

   Integration tests for complete dephasing workflows.


   .. py:method:: setup_method()

      Set up test fixtures.



   .. py:method:: teardown_method()

      Clean up after tests.



   .. py:method:: test_full_dephasing_workflow()

      Test complete dephasing calculation workflow.



   .. py:method:: test_off_diag_dephasing_workflow()

      Test complete off-diagonal dephasing workflow.



   .. py:method:: test_off_diag_dephasing2_workflow()

      Test complete off-diagonal dephasing workflow (version 2).



   .. py:method:: test_version2_consistency()

      Test that CalcOffDiagDeph_E2 and CalcOffDiagDeph_H2 produce valid results.



   .. py:method:: test_different_array_sizes(Nk)

      Test integration with different array sizes.
